title: E283 A Psychic Wordle Turtle and a Tangent Lasagna
description: It's episode 283 and Christine has stopped sleep-honking! Join us for another round of Brazilian alien encounters with the Mirassol Abductions, brought to you by Em's Google translating skills. Then Christine brings us a topic she's been emotionally preparing for: the Oklahoma Girl Scout murders. In an attempt to lift the mood, we also discover both Christine and Eva were kicked out of their Brownies troops... and that's why we drink!
author: andthatswhywedrink@gmail.com (em schulz, christine schiefer, Eva gross)
